summary: Eva Mozes Kor, who survived Josef Mengele's cruel twin experiments in the Auschwitz concentration camp, shocks other Holocaust survivors when she decides to forgive the perpetrators as a way of self-healing.
cast: Eva Mozes Kor|Sami Adwan|Dan Bar-On|Michael Berenbaum|Albert H. Friedlander|Alex Kor|Michael Kor|Rina Kor|Vera Kriegel|Jona Laks|Linda Livni|Hubert Markl|Hans Münch|Ephraim Reichenberg|Mary Wright
title: Forgiving Dr. Mengele
